name: Vixien Base-32
author: Vixien
description:
Vixien Base-32 is a palette I designed as
 my personal all-purpose starting point for new pixel art projects. My 
goal was to create something flexible and cozy set of colors that feels 
pleasant to work with. This palette isn’t meant to be strict or 
limiting. Instead, it’s a foundation that can be easily built on as 
project grows.
